items.sentence: I just happened to be in Boston at the same hotel where Tom was staying.
I want to do everything I can to make sure Tom is able to go to college.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t be able to learn enough French in just three weeks.
I knew you wouldn\'t be able to learn enough French in just three weeks.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to buy you something at the supermarket?
It wouldn\'t be all that difficult for us to do what Tom wants us to do.
Yesterday, when Tom was backing up his car, he ran over Mary\'s bicycle.
After I got married, my Japanese got better and I could understand more.
As soon as I can get the chance, I\'ll help your mother paint the fence.
Though I\'ve decided to go to the party, I\'m not looking forward to it.
